content.html: Ya know, if I wasn’t so bad at systems design interviews (it’s always these that ruin me), I might have gotten an offer from Twitter at the start of the year, and right now would have been a VERY different experience. Sometimes you have to be thankful for what you failed at.
content.value:
Ya know, if I wasn’t so bad at systems design interviews (it’s always these that ruin me), I might have gotten an offer from Twitter at the start of the year, and right now would have been a VERY different experience.

Sometimes you have to be thankful for what you failed at.
